user_data.target_needs: The main need I wanted to fulfill was comfort and support in everyday wear, particularly in undergarments.
purchase_reason: The primary reason for purchasing this product was the expectation of comfort and a secure fit. However, the experience was disappointing as the product did not meet these expectations, leading to strong negative feelings towards it.

The decision to purchase this item was driven by the desire for comfort and quality. The product's description highlighted features such as a soft waistband and premium cotton material, which aligned with my needs for all-day wear. The positive reviews and the reasonable price also influenced my decision.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are durable, functional, and comfortable. I value high-quality materials and craftsmanship, as well as features that enhance usability, such as moisture-wicking properties and secure fits. I appreciate items that offer a good balance of style and practicality, making them suitable for everyday use. Additionally, I tend to favor products that provide a perfect fit and are designed to last, as evidenced by my positive experiences with various clothing and accessories. On the other hand, I dislike products that are poorly made, lack durability, or do not meet my comfort expectations, particularly in clothing items like socks and underwear.

conversation.content: I want to find comfortable and supportive undergarments for everyday wear. within my expected price range: [20.99, 25.54]
What specific type of undergarments are you looking for? (e.g., bras, panties, boxers)

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Hanes Men's Boxers 5-Pack, Cotton Knit Comfortable Boxer Underwear, Moisture-Wicking Cotton Boxers Multipack> / Item ID: B09J24M56M / Price: $20.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Boxers'] / Description: ["Think of everything you love about your softest tee and imagine how that would feel in ultra-comfortable cotton knit boxers. Here they are from Hanes® with comfort in every detail. Soft and breathable, these basic knit boxers are made from Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks moisture away from your skin to keep you cool and dry all day. These cotton boxers enhance comfort further with the ComfortFlex® stretch logo waistband that moves with you and keeps its shape wash after wash without pinching or binding. Another detail of comfort designed into Hanes® T-shirt-soft knit underwear is the tagless styling which means no annoying tag to bunch up or itch. You'll also appreciate the button fly that stays smooth and the convenience of a 5-pack for stock-up ease."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Mens Tagless Boxer Briefs with ComfortSoft Waistband 4-Pack> / Item ID: B0BGNWCS7F / Price: $15.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Boxer Briefs'] / Description: ['As soft as your favorite tee. Comfortable for EVERY day wear.'] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Hanes Boxer Briefs, Cool Dri Moisture-Wicking Underwear, Cotton No-Ride-up for Men, Multi-Packs Available> / Item ID: B0BH113WW9 / Price: $25.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Boxer Briefs'] / Description: ["This men's boxer briefs multipack is made from 100% cotton that's soft and breathable for everyday comfort (heathered styles are a cotton-rich blend). Our moisture-wicking underwear is designed with Cool Comfort® fabric that helps keep you cool no matter what your day brings. Our experts also designed these men's underwear with no-ride-up construction and a Comfort Flex® waistband that stretches and moves with you. Plus, you can throw them right in the washer on laundry day. We also love how these tagless boxer brief underwear sets are available in multiple color and pack options, so you can choose the one that works best for you."]
